Identifies the dependency property.
Lists the fit modes of appointment in the time cell(s) by stretching it to the cell's boundaries.

para.para: An appointment is always stretched to cell borders so that it occupies the entire cell or several cells.

summary.para: Appointment is stretched to a cell border only if the appointment start and end are located in the same cell or in adjacent cells.

The appointment visible width is proportional to its duration. However, there is a minimal visible width () or height (). If an appointment's duration is quite small, it will never be narrower than the minimal value.
A base class that provides data for events which occur before displaying windows and dialogs.
Default dialog which is invoked when the end-user attempts to edit recurrence information for an appointment by clicking the Recurrence button in the dialog or executing the proper UI commands.
Initializes a new instance of the RecurrenceWindow class with the default settings.
Initializes the RecurrenceWindow from XAML.
A dialog which is invoked when the end-user executes the Customize Time Ruler command in the timeruler's context menu.
Initializes a new instance of the TimeRulerWindow class with the default settings.
Initializes the TimeRulerWindow from XAML.
A dialog which is invoked when the end-user attempts to navigate to a certain date and executes the corresponding command.
Initializes a new instance of the GotoDateWindow class with the default settings.
Initializes the GotoDateWindow from XAML.
A dialog which is invoked when the end-user attempts to delete a recurrent appointment.
Initializes a new instance of the DeleteOccurrenceWindow class with the default settings.
Initializes the DeleteOccurrenceWindow from XAML.
A window invoked when the reminder triggers an alert.
Initializes a new instance of the RemindersWindow class with the default settings.
Initializes the RemindersWindow from XAML.
Maps persistent object's properties to the data source fields.
